extendedInfo.description: Bank Balance enables you to view your bank account balance(s) with just a single tap! If you want your account balance(s) right now, with a single tap of your finger, this is the way to do it. Simply swipe to your bank and tap the âBALâ message button. Itâs just that easy. Your bank will then send you your account balance(s) via text message. This app is perfect for quickly viewing your account balance(s) without needing to actually login to your bank account. Thatâs the way it should be, simple and smart.Setup:1) Sign up for Text Banking with your bank (links below)2) Use Bank Balance to easily send messages for you3) Get your account balances and other information delivered to your phone via text messageSupported Bank Text Numbers and Sign Up Links:692632 = MYBOFA = https://www.bankofamerica.com/online-banking/sms-text-banking.go24273 = CHASE = https://www.chase.com/online/services/text-banking.htm692484 = MYCITI = https://online.citibank.com/US/JRS/pands/detail.do?ID=CitiMobileSMS872265 = USBANK = https://www.usbank.com/mobile/text-banking.html93557 = WELLS = https://www.wellsfargo.com/mobile/textbankingFAQ: Is using Bank Balance safe?FAQ Answer: Yes. Bank Balance never deals with, looks at, or even has access to the message data you receive from your bank. By setting up Text Banking with your bank (links above) your bank can automatically recognize the bank account that is synced with your phone number. Bank Balance simplifies the message sending process so you just tap a button to get your account balance(s). Your bank confirms your account by your synced phone number and then sends you your requested information.Disclosure: This app requires that you set up Text Banking with your bank(s). Once set up, Bank Balance will send you your account balance(s) with a single tap. Enjoy.Message and data rates may apply. Such charges include those from your communications service provider. Delivery of alerts may be delayed for various reasons, including service outages affecting your phone, wireless or internet provider; technology failures; and system capacity limitations. Any time you review your balance, keep in mind it may not reflect all transactions including recent debit card transactions or checks you have written.Send improvement ideas and feature requests to thedaklab@gmail.com.

reviews.title: Simple yet efficient
reviews.comment: Extremely efficient banking in an easy-to-use interface. Love the styling, too. I will certainly recommend to others. Looking forward to more Daklab developments.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Just one click
reviews.comment: Cool. This is easier than having to type in the codes, especially if you are a high roller like me with many bank accounts.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Jared
reviews.comment: Makes banking on your phone more simplistic then regular bank apps! Great tool for everyones phone.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Review
reviews.comment: I guess its useful, way less painful then typing those stinkin\' three letter texts. App-tastic!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Simple & clutter free
reviews.comment: Easy to use and easy on the eyes. No clutter or messy ads. Nice work from the developer, download this app!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Works awesome once you get it set up.
reviews.author: A Google User
